title: bossshop玩家变量问题
author: qq120108321
txt_content: %player% %name% %player_name% {player} <player> ←全都没有用，bossshop玩家变量到底是哪个……

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
原版的bossshop 应该是%player%
如果你用了论坛里修改的那个BossShop重制 应该是%player_name%
https://www.spigotmc.org/wiki/placeholderapi-placeholders/
需要安装PlaceholderAPI和对应的模块Player

replies.author: ouAuAuo
replies.txt_content:
玩家变量 %player%

请确保服务器装了最新版的BossShop
